channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Guardium Data Encryption
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Guardium Data Encryption

item.title: CVE-2021-20379|2024-09-16T17:32:50.711Z -- ibm -- guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 3.0.0.3 and 4.0.0.4 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 195711.

item.title: CVE-2021-20417|2024-09-16T16:28:51.848Z -- ibm -- guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 4.0.0.4 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 196219
